results.title: How to manage groups - Microsoft Entra
results.description: Manage Microsoft Entra groups and group membership Microsoft Entra groups are used to manage users that all need the same access and permissions to resources, such as potentially restricted apps and services.

descriptions.content: Manage Microsoft Entra groups and group membership Microsoft Entra groups are used to manage users that all need the same access and permissions to resources, such as potentially restricted apps and services.

results.title: IF function (DAX) - DAX
results.description: Because there's no value_if_false value, BLANK is returned. Examples in this article can be used with the sample Adventure Works DW 2020 Power BI Desktop model. To get the model, see DAX sample model. The third example uses the same test, but this time nests an IF function to perform an additional test. Tip When you need to nest multiple IF.

descriptions.content: Because there's no value_if_false value, BLANK is returned. Examples in this article can be used with the sample Adventure Works DW 2020 Power BI Desktop model. To get the model, see DAX sample model. The third example uses the same test, but this time nests an IF function to perform an additional test. Tip When you need to nest multiple IF.

results.title: File nesting rules for Solution Explorer - Visual Studio (Windows)
results.description: The available rules are: extensionToExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file.js under file.ts fileSuffixToExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file-vsdoc.js under file.js addedExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file.html.css under file.html pathSegment: Use this type of rule to nest jquery.min.js under jquery.js allExtensions: Use.

descriptions.content: The available rules are: extensionToExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file.js under file.ts fileSuffixToExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file-vsdoc.js under file.js addedExtension: Use this type of rule to nest file.html.css under file.html pathSegment: Use this type of rule to nest jquery.min.js under jquery.js allExtensions: Use.
